about_the_game:
A Game from the "Legends of Savvarah" series.

Nikaria is an agent of Chazir, a servant of the mysterious god Dadar, who after a mystical ritual ceased to be human. Now, her entire body is a weapon, Dadar's weapon.

She has no moral boundaries. The end justifies any means, and Dadar's will are above any mortal law.

Chazir sends Nikaria to another country as a spy. She will meet other agents, becoming entangled in their internal disputes, which may jeopardize her entire mission.

Will Nikaria eliminate everyone who stands in her way? Will she fail the mission? Will she resolve all conflicts? Or will she arrive at a completely different ending? The decision is up to you.

FEATURES:
  • Non-linear storyline: 11 endings and numerous ways to reach them. Your choices truly matter;
  • Vibrant visual style, original soundtrack;
  • Well-crafted, vivid characters with whom various, including romantic relationships, can be formed (3 romantic interests);
  • A detailed, original fantasy world that goes beyond the game storyline.
